mapper.select: select m.m_name, m.m_birth, m.m_sex, m.m_position, m.m_foot, m.m_pic, m.m_phone from member m inner join clubmember cm on m.m_id = cm.m_id where cm.c_idx = #{c_idx} order by cm_grade asc
mapper.insert: insert into clubmember values(clubmember_seq.nextval, #{c_idx}, #{m_id}, default, default, default, #{cm_memo})
mapper.select: select * from club c inner join clubmember cm on c.c_idx = cm.c_idx where cm.m_id like #{param1}
select count(*) from club c inner join clubmember cm on c.c_idx = cm.c_idx where cm.m_id like #{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into clubmember (cm_idx,c_idx,m_id,cm_check,cm_date, cm_grade, cm_memo) values( clubmember_seq.nextval, #{param2}, #{param1}, 'yes', default, 'head', '클럽 생성자' )
mapper.select: select m.*, cm.cm_memo, cm.cm_idx from member m inner join clubmember cm on m.m_id = cm.m_id where cm.c_idx = #{c_idx} and cm.cm_check = 'no'
mapper.update: update clubmember set cm_check = 'yes' where cm_idx = #{param1}
